tour_name: Iguazu Falls & Ibera Wetlands: Argentina's Natural Wonders

sections.title: Iguazu Falls: A Majestic Beginning
sections.content: Immerse yourselves in the awe-inspiring power and beauty of Iguazu Falls. Begin with a guided hike to the Devil's Throat, the largest and most spectacular of the falls. Feel the mist on your skin during a thrilling boat ride that takes you right under the cascading water. In the evening, enjoy a romantic dinner at a local restaurant offering breathtaking views of the illuminated falls. Consider a helicopter tour for a panoramic perspective of this natural wonder. The following days can be used to explore different trails and viewing points and simply relaxing in the magnificent surroundings.

sections.title: Ibera Wetlands: Untamed Nature & Romantic Escapes
sections.content: Journey to the Ibera Wetlands, one of the largest freshwater wetlands in the world, and a haven for wildlife. Settle into a luxurious eco-lodge designed to minimize environmental impact while maximizing comfort. Explore the wetlands by boat, gliding through serene waterways and spotting caimans, capybaras, and diverse birdlife, including toucans. Experience the tranquility of the pampas on horseback, with a guided tour that immerses you in the unique ecosystem. Enjoy a private and romantic picnic amidst the stunning natural landscapes. Indulge in a rejuvenating couples' spa treatment at the lodge, using locally sourced ingredients and traditional techniques.

sections.title: Buenos Aires: Tango, Culture & Culinary Delights
sections.content: Conclude your honeymoon in the vibrant city of Buenos Aires. Immerse yourselves in the city's rich culture with a private tango lesson, learning the passionate steps of Argentina's most iconic dance. Visit the historic Plaza de Mayo, the heart of Buenos Aires, and explore the colourful La Boca neighbourhood. Discover the elegant Recoleta Cemetery and the trendy Palermo district. Enjoy exclusive behind-the-scenes tours of historic buildings. Savor the city's renowned culinary scene with a farewell dinner at a Michelin-starred restaurant, and enjoy a special night at a traditional Tango show. During the days, you can consider art gallery and museum visits or personalized shopping tours.
